attributes.action: EX-ARMED FORCES PERSONNEL SHOULD BE ENTITLED TO THE SAME BENEFITS AS THERE COUNTER PARTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WHY SHOULD EX-SERVICE PERSONNEL BE DIS-COUNTED FOR BENEFITS BECAUSE OF THERE FORCES PENSION? ILLEGAL OR OUTSIDE NATIONALS SETTLING IN THIS COUNTRY ARE ENTITLED TO MORE BENEFITS THAN UK ARMED FORCES, IN THAT THEY ARE ENTITLED TO HOUSING AT NO COST TO THEM OR RENT ETC, PUT EX FORCES ARE TOLD TO PAY FOR BILLS AND COUNCIL RENT AND COUNCIL TAX OUT OF THERE PENSION AND THEY HAVE SERVED THERE COUNTRY, WHAT ABOUT THEM, IMMIRGRANTS AND FOREIGN NATIONALS THAT HAVE PAYED NOTHING ARE ARE ENTITLED TO MORE NHS COVER THAN EX-SERVICEMEN OR WOMEN THAT HAVE FOUGHT FOR THERE COUNTRY. IS THIS FAIR?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
